sense.name: feel the strong need to eat
sense.examples: Enso would persist as long as Alessandro hungered. I go about hungering and thirsting for the fellowship of those who feel so too. Hundreds of single men were hungering for feminine society. Oprah gives the children what they hunger for: an education. They hungered also to know that there was a plan. They hungered because the bread they had brought with them out of Egypt was gone.
